articles.title: 3 Reasons We’re Fans of Datadog (DDOG)
articles.summary: StockStory: 3 Reasons We’re Fans of Datadog (DDOG). Datadog has followed the market’s trajectory closely, rising in tandem with the S&P 500 over the past six months. The stock has climbed by 9.5% to $141.85 per share while the index has gained 13.4%. Related tickers mentioned: ^GSPC.
